PLOT

Connor Mead, a successful fashion photographer and a Lothario keen on 
casual sex, goes to his younger brother's wedding to convince him not to 
marry. He arrives at his dead uncle's estate during the rehearsal the night 
before the wedding; he starts in, taking his brother aside, trashing marriage.
Later in the men's room, his uncle, who taught Connor all he knows about 
women, appears to him, confesses to have been wrong, and tells Connor that 
three ghosts will visit him that night: the ghosts of girlfriends past, 
present, and future. Connor has already set the breakup in motion. Can he 
learn anything from his life and fix what he's broken?
